title: Reval
content: Is the reval results for isa 1 for 2nd year done its only 20 days for isa 2

comments.body: Heard that results were supposed to be out on Thursday or Friday last week
Then the correction is full scam holy shit
It was supposed to be out but it isn't ig
Our teacher told overall average gonna increase by 5-6 marks
Ya I'm getting atleast 4 marks more in DSP
